title: Flowerperson
body:
<<if !visited("Flowerperson")>>

<<else>>
    Hello there mechanic pal
    <<if visited("Postperson.GivePost") && !visited("Flowerperson.TakePost")>>
        -> I have a letter for you here
            [[Flowerperson.TakePost]]
        -> How are you?
            [[Flowerperson.Smalltalk]]
    <<endif>>
    <<if visited("Postperson.AllPostDelivered") && !visited("Flowerperson.GiveSeeds")>>
        -> I need a few seeds for the carrier birds.
            [[Flowerperson.GiveSeeds]]
        -> How are you?
            [[Flowerperson.Smalltalk]]
    <<endif>>
    <<if $BirdsAteSeeds && !visited("Flowerperson.AggressiveBirdReaction")>>
        How did the birds like the seeds?
        -> They got very active and destroyed a gate
            [[Flowerperson.AggressiveBirdReaction]]
    <<endif>>
    [[Flowerperson.Smalltalk]]
<<endif>>

title: Flowerperson.TakePost
body:
Oh, thank you!
That's probably the seeds I'm expecting.
I'm gonna plant a ton of colorful flowers,
it's something we all need right now.

title: Flowerperson.GiveSeeds
body:
Sure, here you go.
They were part of the delivery you gave me earlier.
Did something bad happen to the birds?

title: Flowerperson.Smalltalk
body:
Are you interrested in a few flowers?
You have to safe the world? I guess not then.
Come back when the world is saved or whatever.

title: Flowerperson.AggressiveBirdReaction
body:
Oh no! This shoudn't happen.
Sure, the seeds should give them energy, 
but not make them aggressive.
I'll assume for now that they were angry to begin with,
but if that happens again definitely tell me!
